subject: Add multi-image support to layout presets
body:
- Changed imageCell to imageCells array in all 28 layout presets
- 7 layouts now have 2 image cells: quad-grid, stacked-quad,
  header-quad, wide-feature, tall-feature, columns-four, asymmetric-grid
- loadSampleImage now loads different sample images for each image cell
- All components updated to handle imageCells array with backward compat
- Updated CellGrid, MiniCellGrid to highlight multiple image cells

https://claude.ai/code/session_01GjPKuSJZuDMoStckvT7wR5
title: Add multi-image support to layout presets
